QuestData.Title: Sethria's Brood
QuestData.Description: First order of business is to thin the herd here. This place crawls.$B$BLet's start slaughtering these dragonkin and worry about why they're here later.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 12 of Sethria's Minions: Any combination of Twilight Dragonkin or Twilight Dragonkin Armorers.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you delivered a message?$B$BBe sure to take flight, too, and hunt Sethria's minions on the other ledges.
QuestData.RewardText: You're good at this.$B$BI like you.
